title: Billing - Suspend Account for Non-Payment
description: A client is 90 days overdue on their invoices. The account manager needs to suspend their services.

tasks.description: Verify the client's overdue balance and that multiple payment reminders have been sent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms the account is severely delinquent.

tasks.description: Send a final notice to the client informing them that services will be suspended in 48 hours if payment is not received.
After 48 hours with no payment, place the client's account and services into a suspended state.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client's services are suspended pending payment.
